channel.title: Dotfiles on typdef's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dotfiles on typdef's Blog

item.title: Vscode setup
item.description: The base config is as follows: { "editor.fontSize": 16, "editor.glyphMargin": true, "editor.suggest.preview": true, "editor.minimap.autohide": true, "editor.cursorBlinking": "phase", "editor.wordWrap": "on", "files.autoSave": "afterDelay", "breadcrumbs.enabled": false, "telemetry.telemetryLevel": "off", "window.autoDetectColorScheme": true, "editor.suggest.localityBonus": true, "editor.guides.bracketPairs": "active", "editor.fontFamily": "JetBrainsMono NF Medium", "window.commandCenter": false, "workbench.layoutControl.enabled": false }
